reviews.review_msg: Alex is an amazing professor. He is super intelligent and you can tell he really knows his stuff. He's really interested and cares about the material he is teaching and he makes the classes fun. I've taken 2 classes with him and both went really well. He marks fairly and he's very understanding. Overall, he's pretty easy going and fun.
Great tree pictures, entertaining speaker. Manages to be sympathetic to carpenters and tree huggers too. The assignments are helpful for job market preparation.
